00247 class CompareCosineNode
00248 {
00249  public:
00250  
00251   // Comparison function for construction of priority queue.
00252   bool operator() (const CosineTree* a, const CosineTree* b) const
00253   {
00254     return a->L2Error() < b->L2Error();
00255   }
00256 };
